# Booked.com - HTML & CSS Only Project

<h3 align="center"> Live Website </h3>
<p align="center">
  <a href="https://bookedcom.tuanle.top"><img height="30px" src="https://img.shields.io/badge/Live%20Website-success.svg?logo=data%3Aimage%2Fsvg%2Bxml%3Bbase64%%3D"></a>
</p>

## Description

Booked.com is a static responsive website project that uses only HTML and CSS without any frameworks, scripts, libraries, or packages.

## Features

- **Popup Modal**: Navigate to the `Destination` page, and you will see a map with locations tagged on. Click on any location, and you will see a modal popup with the information about the location, and there will be a button as well that you can click to see more details. This button and detail box appear with transitions as well.
- **Form Submission**: Navigate to the `Book` page, when you submit the form, you will see a message displayed under the form. This can be done by using HTML and CSS only by assigning an ID to the message, hiding it first, and setting the action property of the form to be the message id.

## Technologies Used

- **HTML**: For structuring the content of the website.
- **CSS**: For styling the website and creating the modal transitions.

## Installation and Setup

To set up and run Bookedcom on your local machine, follow these steps:

1. Clone the repository to your local machine.
2. Open any `.html` file in your preferred web browser.
